game.title: Quest for the Lost Treasure
game.objective: Find and retrieve the ancient lost treasure from the depths of the jungle.
game.description: In this quest, you'll journey through treacherous terrain and solve puzzles to locate the hidden treasure. Your ultimate goal is to bring it back to the quest giver.
game.reward: 1000 gold coins and a legendary artifact

task.objective: Obtain the Jungle Map from the图书馆
task.description: You'll need to search for the map that reveals the path through the jungle. It's said to be hidden within the old library.
In the heart of the jungle, you'll find a statue blocking your path. Solve its riddle to proceed.

task.objective: Recover the treasure from the Temple
task.description: The final challenge lies within an ancient temple. Fight your way through and claim the lost treasure.
